item.title: Djinnjer add a quote by Anne Fadiman
item.description: "It has long been my belief that everyone's library contains an Odd Shelf. On this shelf rests a small, mysterious corpus of volumes whose subject matter is completely unrelated to the rest of the library, yet which, upon closer inspection, reveals a good deal about its owner." -- Anne Fadiman

item.title: Djinnjer add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
item.description: "Real life is sometimes boring, rarely conclusive and boy, does the dialogue need work." -- Sarah Rees Brennan

item.title: Djinnjer add a quote by Robin Sloan
item.description: "There is no immortality that is not built on friendship and work done with care. All the secrets in the world worth knowing are hiding in plain sight." -- Robin Sloan

item.title: Djinnjer add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Djinnjer add a quote by Kameron Hurley
item.description: "Life was what you did with what was done to you." -- Kameron Hurley

item.title: Djinnjer add a quote by PG Wodehouse
item.description: "Are there any books of that sort nowadays? The only ones I ever see mentioned in the papers are about married couples who find life grey, and can't stick each other at any price." -- PG Wodehouse
